name: Wand Level99
description:
Control

Direction: ←→　/ Mouse / Touch Screen
Menu: [Cursor,Enter,Space] Key / Mouse / Touch Screen

how to play

Let's break the block and get items.
Power up the wand with items.
If you fail to shoot a bomb block that is flashing red, you will make a mistake.
You can freely select the stage you cleared at the beginning of the game.
Let's change the stage and power up if you go all the way.
Let's challenge several times and aim for level 99!
